English: Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower

d.f: `為~`雙子葉植物~`中~`含~`瓣~`植物~`之~`一~`科~，`草本~`或~`小~`灌木~，`葉~`互生~，`或~`對生~，`花冠~`舌~`狀~，`實~`為~`瘦果~，`種子~`無~`胚乳~。`如~`蒲公英~`等~。

English: Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
